body: I was excited for the 1.8 update to come out, then I had some troubles trying to update it. Magic Launcher says your Minecraft should update itself. Nope. Anyone got some advice for me? Thanks :D
body_tagged: I was excited for the 1.8 update to come out, then I had some troubles trying to update it. Magic Launcher says your Minecraft should update itself. Nope. Anyone got some advice for me? Thanks :D
title: Houston, I've got a problem.

replies.body: Haven't tried to update it yet, so idk, sorry
replies.body_tagged: Haven't tried to update it yet, so idk, sorry

replies.body:
"Houston, we've got a problem"


Use the normal Minecraft launcher instead, the magic launcher is messy, wait till it gets updated..
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
ok thanks guys :)

@ AwarriorVenom: I know the quote, but since its only me that has this problem I thought I would just make it singular.

ok thanks guys :)

replies.body: I had bad experiences with the magic launcher so I wouldn't recommend it, just use the normal launcher.
replies.body_tagged: I had bad experiences with the magic launcher so I wouldn't recommend it, just use the normal launcher.

replies.body: erm, have you tried downloading 1.7.9 off the regular launcher and then going on magic launcher? I remember when I used it in 1.6.4 and a bit higher I had to always download it first from the regular launcher to get the 1.6.5.jar update
